evidence.claim: Surgio Health uses HL7 and FHIR standards for data interoperability in health tech solutions.
The platform supports X12 transaction sets for streamlined billing and claims processing.
Claims management features integrate securely with existing EHRs.
Utilizes real-time data streaming for patient data updates.

icp.icp_reason: Offers solutions for healthcare data exchange, including X12 and claims management.
